page_content:
Print

Version:MissionOS_2.0

Graphs in the MissionOS application possess a number of functionalities which can be used to represent the instrument data which is beneficial for the users. You can use the Print option to print the graphs.

 

 

A print interface opens in a new window. You can configure the preferable settings and select the Print button to complete the action.

 

 

To watch the Web User Manual video on Print Options, simply click on the thumbnail or link below:

videos.title: How To: Print A Graph in MissionOS
